TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ClientIDMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: Specifies how ASP.NET generates the for a control that can be accessed in client script.

span.span: Specifies how ASP.NET generates the for a control that can be accessed in client script.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Usa el enumeración al establecer el propiedad para un control.You use the enumeration when you set the property for a control. El valor que se asigna a la propiedad determina cómo el se genera la propiedad.The value that you assign to the property determines how the property is generated. El valor de la propiedad se representa como el `id` atributo de marcado y es el valor que usar para el control de acceso del script de cliente.The value of the property is rendered as the `id` attribute in markup, and it is the value that you use to access the control from client script. El valor que se asigna a la no afecta la propiedad el propiedad del control de servidor, solo el `id` atributo del elemento HTML correspondiente.The value that you assign to the property does not affect the property of the server control, only the `id` attribute of the corresponding HTML element. El valor predeterminado de para una página es de predicción.The default value of for a page is Predictable. El valor predeterminado de para un control es heredar.The default value of for a control is Inherit. Dado que el valor predeterminado para los controles es heredar, el modo de generación predeterminada es predicción.Because the default for controls is Inherit, the default generation mode is Predictable. (Sin embargo, si utiliza Visual Studio para convertir un proyecto Web a ASP.NET 4 desde una versión anterior, Visual Studio establece automáticamente el valor predeterminado de sitio a AutoID en el archivo Web.config.)(However, if you use Visual Studio to convert a Web project to ASP.NET 4 from an earlier version, Visual Studio automatically sets the site default to AutoID in the Web.config file.) Puede establecer la `ClientIDMode` valor para todas las páginas en un sitio Web para establecer el elemento en el archivo Web.config del sitio.You can set the `ClientIDMode` value for all pages in a Web site by setting the element in the site's Web.config file. Puede establecer la `ClientIDMode` valor de una página en la directiva.You can set the `ClientIDMode` value for a page in the directive. Para obtener más información, vea [Identificación de controles de formularios Web Forms](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45a8c3ef-5ac7-48f1-862a-0cd5073742e7).For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Server Control Identification](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45a8c3ef-5ac7-48f1-862a-0cd5073742e7). ## Examples El ejemplo siguiente muestra controles que se encuentran en un control.The following example shows controls that are contained in a control. En el (control), el propiedad está establecida en la predicción y el propiedad está establecida en `ProductID`.On the control, the property is set to Predictable and the property is set to `ProductID`. Desde un script de cliente, puede tener acceso a una instancia concreta de un tomando como base la `ProductID` valor de la instancia que está intentando obtener acceso.From client script, you can access a particular instance of a based on the `ProductID` value of the instance that you are trying to access. Este ejemplo crea HTML con tres `ProductIDLabel` controles.This example creates HTML with three `ProductIDLabel` controls. Cuando se ejecuta la página, los identificadores para los controles será la siguiente:When the page runs, the IDs for the controls will be the following: - `ListView1_ProductIDLabel_1` - `ListView1_ProductIDLabel_34` - `ListView1_ProductIDLabel_43` Para obtener más información, vea [identificación de controles de servidor Web de ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45a8c3ef-5ac7-48f1-862a-0cd5073742e7)For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Server Control Identification](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45a8c3ef-5ac7-48f1-862a-0cd5073742e7)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode AutoID = int32(1)

summary.span: The value is generated by concatenating the values of each parent naming container with the value of the control.

span.span: The value is generated by concatenating the values of each parent naming container with the value of the control.

summary.span: In data-binding scenarios where multiple instances of a control are rendered, an incrementing value is inserted in front of the control's value.

span.span: In data-binding scenarios where multiple instances of a control are rendered, an incrementing value is inserted in front of the control's value.

summary.span: Each segment is separated by an underscore character (_).

span.span: Each segment is separated by an underscore character (_).

summary.span: This algorithm is the only one that was available in versions of ASP.NET earlier than ASP.NET 4.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode Predictable = int32(2)

summary.span: This algorithm is used for controls that are in data-bound controls.

span.span: This algorithm is used for controls that are in data-bound controls.

summary.span: The value is generated by concatenating the value of the parent naming container with the value of the control.

span.span: The value is generated by concatenating the value of the parent naming container with the value of the control.

summary.span: If the control is a data-bound control that generates multiple rows, the value of the data field specified in the property is added at the end.

span.span: If the control is a data-bound control that generates multiple rows, the value of the data field specified in the property is added at the end.

summary.span: For the control, multiple data fields can be specified.

span.span: For the control, multiple data fields can be specified.

summary.span: If the property is blank, a sequential number is added at the end instead of a data field value.

span.span: If the property is blank, a sequential number is added at the end instead of a data field value.
